!Trader Renee: Necklace... Ring... Don't you know that you shouldn't buy something just because it sparkles? Do you? An adventurer must have discerning eyes. In Goddard, we have a very large number of adventurers. In order to meet their expectations, my shop carries only the highest-quality items.
